In England, in the seven days to 24 February, there were 57,933 new confirmed cases (102.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 17 February, there were 70,616 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 18% (12,683 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 01 March is 3,663,090 (6,507.9 cases per 100,000 population).
